treatment-md.title: Pedanodectes angustilobus Constantinescu, Chisamera, Mukhim & Adam, 2014, sp. n.
treatment-md.article-title: A new species of pterodectine feather mites (Acarina, Analgoidea, Proctophyllodidae) from the Little Spiderhunter Arachnothera longirostra (Passeriformes, Nectariniidae) in Meghalaya, India
